line_1: But 'twas a fox who spoke th' oration.
The songster heard his short oration,
And thus she opens her oration.
Each common phrase is an oration;
line_2: Where the dire Circle keeps its station,

line_1: And now, with many a fond oration,
line_2: Ye ask, to crown this dear vacation,

line_1: T' harangue the Crowd in Funeral Oration:
line_2: No one so fit as G— in all the Nation

line_1: For Bath will I speak, and I'll make an Oration
line_2: Shall obtain me the Freedom of this Corporation;
And thus without Wit, or the least Provocation,
